explanation: [0-0] In an outdoor setting, a woman in a blue top and a skirt made of different colored shopping bags stands sideways on a shovel. She holds her left hand above her head. To her left, a man in black and white sportswear stands with his legs apart, bending over and gripping the handle of the shovel. To her right, a woman in a blue and gray striped top and black shorts holds a red broom, the handle of which rests against the back of the woman in the blue top. The background features green trees, bushes, and a section of gray fence.
[0-4] First, the woman in black shorts spins the broom a few times with both hands and then exits to the right.

You can see that she has the broom handle tucked under her right arm, her right hand gripping the top of the broom handle and her left hand raised with her fingers pointing down and resting on top of her head.
